title: Was Porn Showing Up in Facebook Video Search After Outage?
subtitle: Beginning around Jan. 22, 2021, users claimed that simply typing a single letter or the word "videos" into the Facebook search bar returned a "massive amount" of porn.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: In late January 2021, following a Facebook outage, typing a single letter or the word "video" in the Facebook search bar returned pornographic videos.
